item.title: STA 101 Final Project
item.description: This final project has three deliverable items: a pre-project proposal due Friday July 29 at 11:59pm, a final presentation due Thursday August 4 at 11:59pm, final report due Friday August 5 at 11:59pm. In addition to the above, a component of the grade will be peer-reviewing project report drafts during lab in the final week of class and commenting on the presentaitons on August 5th. View team assignments here

item.title: STA 101 Regression Project
item.description: This regression project is due Tuesday July 19 at 11:59pm. View team assignments here The deliverable for this project (what you will turn in) is a written report. See below for more details. About the project For this project you will create a linear model (of your choosing) to predict newborn birth weights (or some transformation of the variable) using a sample of 3000 observations from 2020 US birth data originally sourced from the CDC.
